body_html:
Thanks for getting back to me Hao,

I have indeed specified gpu for computation. If I explicitly assign the GPU, I get the "no kernel found" error, but I'm seeing posts on this thread discussing the speed of GPU calculations, so I have to assume some release of tensorflow has SVD GPU support? Seeing as I need a ton of small SVD decompositions in parallel, I would imagine even a somewhat slower algorithm on the GPU would outperform more efficient CPU implementations...

Thanks again!

body:
Thanks for getting back to me Hao,

I have indeed specified gpu for computation. If I explicitly assign the GPU, I get the "no kernel found" error, but I'm seeing posts on this thread discussing the speed of GPU calculations, so I have to assume some release of tensorflow has SVD GPU support? Seeing as I need a ton of small SVD decompositions in parallel, I would imagine even a somewhat slower algorithm on the GPU would outperform more efficient CPU implementations...

Thanks again!
